snippet: Do reporters care about the tiny trophies of governance? Ashley Parker and David Carr review episode seven, and discuss whether the people who wield pens care about getting one with presidential pixie dust on it.
abstract: Do reporters care about the tiny trophies of governance? Ashley Parker and David Carr review episode seven, and discuss whether the people who wield pens care about getting one with presidential pixie dust on it.

byline.original: By DAVID CARR and ASHLEY PARKER

headline.main: House of Cards: Episode Seven and Father Figures
